name: Eternity Convergence
storyline:
You begin as a novice pilot and miner who discovers an ancient artifact of incredible power during a mining mission. At the same time other artifacts have started to appear on numerous planets and their acquisition has thrown several neighboring galaxies into chaos. Amongst the disarray an organized clandestine force has begun to seek out and remove anyone in the possession of these great tools of power.

Follow along the story line or just explore the galaxy. Work on either side of the law, align with factions to unlock different unique missions, better paying opportunities, and rare technology.
summary: Eternity Convergence is a Sci-fi RPG. The player begins their journey as a pilot in the human controlled galaxy of Ennae. After building up a crew and a small fleet of ships the player can explore hundreds of planets and a number of galaxies to uncover a plot that is preparing to consume all life.
